content: Once you've completed the Iron Ball challenge in the Flaming Mountains and unlocked the Fallen Furnace Crater Keeper's Shrine, head back down the hill and take the newly opened passage on the left. Follow the path until you find a pile of glowing rocks lying in a large clearing. Approach the rocks to awaken the Flint Vanguard.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've completed the Iron Ball challenge in the Flaming Mountains and unlocked the Fallen Furnace Crater Keeper's Shrine, head back down the hill and take the newly opened passage on the left. Follow the path until you find a pile of glowing rocks lying in a large clearing. Approach the rocks to awaken the Flint Vanguard.
